attributes.review: Just to be clear, I am not part of the whole “trying to remove the app” thing. I am trying to help other people not get their data stolen like I did! It also made me delete some of my pictures! I am so angry right now!!! Bottom line, HORRIBLE APP.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE, STOLE MY DATA

attributes.review: I would give 0 stars if I could. Definitely steampunk dystopian that our pedophilic racist corporate overlord has an app. But less we forget ‘there’s an app for that’ brb scrubbing my phone of any reminders of this godforsaken waste of technological advancement that is this app.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I decided to download this app to support our wonderful President. It took forever to download, then crashed every time I tried to open it. This app is terrible, THE worst. The absolute worst in human history. You know how I know? Because I am a jenius. A very. Stable. JENIUS.
attributes.title: Just don’t.

attributes.review: It took over 2 HOURS TO DOWNLOAD. Once it downloaded, every single contact in my phone, including work contacts, were sent a text saying if they didn’t vote for Donald trump they were losers 😤😤 very disappointed in our ✨orange✨
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: 😚🚣🏻‍♀️➗They tracked my location and then came to my school and stole my Guinea pig 🍵and ate my nakid mole rat. 🤲🏻I’ve had these pets for my whole life and i wanted to eat them first. 🐀I’m 69 years old too. I downloaded this app to support my favorite chetto and instead i was left with a nakid mole rat. 👕🤖➗💫🚣🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: ate my nakid mole rat 😱😭🤲🏻💕👄🐀➗🚣🏻‍♀️

attributes.review: this app is a DISGRACE to literally ANYTHING. its horrible. has a TON of bugs. SUPER slow. AWFUL design. GROSS color choices. and overall one of the WORST things ive ever gotten off of here... i might have to switch to google downloads because if apple allows this MONSTROSITY to be on here, i WONT hesitate to leave.
attributes.title: AWFUL🤢

attributes.review: This app is incredibly misleading as you would think that the president of the United States would be a good person but this is not the case. The app has quite frankly scarred me for life and I’m not sure I will ever recover. The app supports racism and homophobia and is just all together disgusting and inhuman
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app is horrible! I do NOT recommend!! It took forever to download. When it finally downloaded it took 10 hours to open then it crashed! This app is useless unless you was to waste your time! Trust me and DO NOT get this app!!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!

attributes.review: This is by far the worst app I’ve downloaded on my phone. Took forever to download in the first place then once it did download the app started to glitch. It then proceeded to force quit and wouldn’t let me open it again.
attributes.title: the WORST app

attributes.review:
Am I disappointed? Yes🤬
Am I surprised? No😔
Do I like Cheetos? Heck no they’re gross 🤢
Will manny be televised? No😡
Is 1d coming back? Hopefully 🥺
Is Harry styles a king? YES🥰
Hotel? Trivago 🏨
Manny Heffley our lord and savior would never approve of this app. Neither would twitter’s white boy of the millennium HARRY EDWARD STYLES.
He’s say and I quote 
“I’m really upset”
I was hoping to be greeted with a video of trump eating Cheetos but was let down by the lack of cheese chips. TRUMP DO BETTER!!!!
Update: you should get the calm app Harry styles will read you a bed time story while you fall asleep 😌✨🧚🏽‍♀️🥰
attributes.title: TMWNBT
